channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MAHOUT-1511] Renaming core to mrlegacy
item.description: Rename the core module to mrlegacy to reflect that we still maintain this code but do not add new MR algorithms. We should aim to gradually pull out items that are really needed from this module.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Frank Scholten you wanted to take this on, right?
Yes, working on it as we speak. I'll add a patch soon.

The build fails locally on math-scala, though not on Jenkins https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/2580/consoleText. Any idea what could be wrong?

Hmm, build does succeed on my desktop. I'll continue with the patch.
Committed the changes. Wanted to add CHANGELOG to the patch but it became too unwieldy to apply.

FAILURE: Integrated in Mahout-Quality #2581 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/2581/)
